00018 #include "ckeychooser.h"
00019 #include "../../backend/cswordmoduleinfo.h"
00020 #include "../../backend/cswordbiblemoduleinfo.h"
00021 #include "../../backend/cswordcommentarymoduleinfo.h"

00024 #include "clexiconkeychooser.h"

00026 #include "cbookkeychooser.h"

00028 CKeyChooser::CKeyChooser(ListCSwordModuleInfo, CSwordKey *, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00029     : QWidget(parent, name){
00030 }
00031 
00032 CKeyChooser* CKeyChooser::createInstance(ListCSwordModuleInfo modules, CSwordKey *key, QWidget *parent){    
00033     if (!modules.count())
00034         return 0;
00035 
00036   CKeyChooser* ck = 0;
00037     switch ( modules.first()->type() ){
00038       case CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary:     //Bibles and commentaries uise the same key chooser
00039       case CSwordModuleInfo::Bible:
00040         ck = new CBibleKeyChooser(modules,key,parent);
00041       break;
00042       case CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon:
00043             ck = new CLexiconKeyChooser(modules,key,parent);    
00044       break;
00045       case CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook:
00046         ck = new CBookKeyChooser(modules,key,parent);
00047       break;
00048       default:
00049         return 0;
00050     }
00051   return ck;
00052 }
